holidays.description: Ever wonder how it will be if we run out of resources on our planet? Read on to find out.

holidays.description: Get ready to float above the Earth and admire the view from greater heights.

holidays.title: National Moonshine Day
holidays.description: Moonshine, once a fiery (and illegal) homemade liquor, has now gone legit.

holidays.description: This day celebrates the veggie burger and its positive impact on the environment.

holidays.title: Sausage Roll Day
holidays.description: From a mixture of chopped meat and seasoning, stuffed in delicious casings, comes flavorful sausage rolls.

holidays.title: World Environment Day
holidays.description: World Environment Day is both a global celebration and a platform for public outreach.

holidays.title: Brandon Farris’s Birthday

holidays.title: Pancho Villa’s Birthday
